# URL.FormatStyle.Component.host

**Case**

The URL format style host component.

## Declaration

```swift
case host
```

## URL format style components

- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.scheme**: The URL format style scheme component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.port**: The URL format style port component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.user**: The URL format style user component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.password**: The URL format style password component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.path**: The URL format style path component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.query**: The URL format style query component.
- **URL.FormatStyle.Component.fragment**: The URL format style fragment component.
